### c05m05.com

[c05m05.com](https://c05m05.com) is a purely JavasScript project with i had a chance work on in 2015. I have been amazed by the Three.js WebGL library, what led me to experiment with the framework and create this cosmic interface and game. Currently a bit old and good place for me to look where i started own journey with JS.

Main stack: JavaScript, three.js lib

### The model

[<video src='video1.mov' width=180/>](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/22400623/353615203-26ff0273-7a04-4e76-b7cb-d6db8b0cfb51.mp4?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..9eC6n-zMpaj0u_fgz25zceengsGKFxNOp8hQJbnOH4s)

Features:
- [x] custom interface with settings
- [x] ability to explore an universe, planets and orbits
- [x] stereographic mode
- [x] custom sounds and sounds near objects
- [x] custom 3d models

Future features:
- [ ] project goes to typescript + react-fiber

### Arcade game

[<video src='video1.mov' width=180/>](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/22400623/353939240-c1507dbe-638c-4d03-8f26-9ebcb7cfa607.mp4?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..OY3MUvSFWyDOyk-_JycwGIvG-Xq5fSInRbyaR_5fb5U)

PLEASE, KEEP IN MIND it was 2015... ðŸ˜‚

Features:
- [x] arcade game based on old "Asteroid" concept but in 3d world... universe
- [x] WSAD control, SHIFT change camera, MousePointer control, key [1] [2] [3] extra powerfull weapons
- [x] 3d models (blender)
- [x] cube environment for 360 background view
- [x] basic AI enemies
      
Future features:
- [ ] project goes to modern JS pattern (ECMAScript 7 / ES2016) via AI support
